thread.title: Colorado Avalanche set to host 0-8 Columbus on Saturday
thread.title_full: Colorado Avalanche set to host 0-8 Columbus on Saturday

title: Colorado Avalanche set to host 0-8 Columbus on Saturday
text:
Published By: Denver Post Avalanche - Today 
The Avalanche practiced Friday to further prepare for Saturday night's game against the 0-8 Columbus Blue Jackets at the Pepsi Center....
